properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 9:27AM HST until February 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR HALEAKALA AND BIG ISLAND SUMMITS
UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY...

.Periods of snow and freezing rain are expected through tonight.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up
to two inches, and ice accumulations of around one-tenth of an
inch. Although temperatures may rise above freezing today on the
Haleakala Summit, sub-freezing temperatures are expected again
tonight, increasing the potential for freezing rain and black
ice. Temperatures on the Big Island Summits are expected to
remain below freezing through at least tonight, with bouts of
wintry weather.

* WHERE...Haleakala and Big Island Summits.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions leading to road
closures. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at
times, with periods of zero visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while
driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY
